newsitem.title: BRAZIL: RESEARCH ALERT - Eletropaulo downgraded to hold.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Eletropaulo downgraded to hold.

text.p: -- Fator Securities said in a report it was downgrading Sao Paulo state-owned power utility Eletropaulo to hold from buy.
-- It said Eletropaulo shares have reached a fair value, noting the stock would have a restricted outlook following its 53.1 percent rise in the year.
-- "However, we would stress that our forecasts are not taking into consideration significant operational changes which should come about only after privatization," it added.
-- Eletropaulo preferred B shares were trading at 234.01 reais, down 0.42 percent.
